posts.post_content:
Posted By: T206Collector
Even if you don't want to sell them, I'd love to have the opportunity to post a scan of any autographed pre-1920 baseball cards I haven't seen on my website, with full credit, of course.

Please shoot me an email if you're interested.

SignedT206@gmail.com



_  _  _  _  _  _  _ _ 

Visit [url]http://www.t206collector.com[/url] for signed deadball card galleries, articles and more!
